name: kj_bf109
title: King Jo's Bf-109
author: TheKingJo
description: Adds a Bf-109. In combination with the AircraftRealism mod you will be able to fly above your enemies, shooting them or other planes. When you reach the takeoff speed, the plane gets invincible to everything except 'flak' damage. This plane is a FIGHTER. Use it against other planes as it deals high anti-aircraft damage.
